conbody.p:
(i) Contracting officers may include a provision substantially the same as
5652.215-9001
, Notice of Pre-proposal Conference, in the solicitation when a pre-proposal conference is contemplated in accordance with
FAR 15.201
. When access to classified documents is contemplated, contracting officers may include a provision substantially the same as the basic provision, Alternate I.
(k) Contracting officers may include a provision substantially the same as the provision at 5652.215-9009 , Personnel Changes before Award, in solicitations requiring submittal of resumes.
